title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 85 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 85 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: Lord, thou hast been favourable unto thy land: thou hast brought back the captivity of Jacob.
lineList.cn: （可拉后裔的诗，交与伶长）耶和华阿，你已经向你的地施恩，救回被掳的雅各。

lineList.en: Thou hast forgiven the iniquity of thy people, thou hast covered all their sin. Selah.
lineList.cn: 你赦免了你百姓的罪孽，遮盖了他们一切的过犯。（细拉）

lineList.en: Thou hast taken away all thy wrath: thou hast turned thyself from the fierceness of thine anger.
lineList.cn: 你收转了所发的忿怒，和你猛烈的怒气。

lineList.en: Turn us, O God of our salvation, and cause thine anger toward us to cease.
lineList.cn: 拯救我们的神阿，求你使我们回转，叫你的恼恨向我们止息。

lineList.en: Wilt thou be angry with us for ever? wilt thou draw out thine anger to all generations?
lineList.cn: 你要向我们发怒到永远吗，你要将你的怒气延留到万代吗。

lineList.en: Wilt thou not revive us again: that thy people may rejoice in thee?
lineList.cn: 你不再将我们救活，使你的百姓靠你欢喜吗。

lineList.en: Shew us thy mercy, O LORD, and grant us thy salvation.
lineList.cn: 耶和华阿，求你使我们得见你的慈爱，又将你的救恩赐给我们。

lineList.en: I will hear what God the LORD will speak: for he will speak peace unto his people, and to his saints: but let them not turn again to folly.
lineList.cn: 我要听神耶和华所说的话。因为他必应许将平安赐给他的百姓，他的圣民。他们却不可再转去妄行。

lineList.en: Surely his salvation is nigh them that fear him; that glory may dwell in our land.
lineList.cn: 他的救恩，诚然与敬畏他的人相近，叫荣耀住在我们的地上。

lineList.en: Mercy and truth are met together; righteousness and peace have kissed each other.
lineList.cn: 慈爱和诚实，彼此相遇。公义和平安，彼此相亲。

lineList.en: Truth shall spring out of the earth; and righteousness shall look down from heaven.
lineList.cn: 诚实从地而生，公义从天而现。

lineList.en: Yea, the LORD shall give that which is good; and our land shall yield her increase.
lineList.cn: 耶和华必将好处赐给我们。我们的地，也要多出土产。

lineList.en: Righteousness shall go before him; and shall set us in the way of his steps.
lineList.cn: 公义要行在他面前，叫他的脚踪，成为可走的路。
